headline: Susan Steinhoff Appointed Chief Underwriting Officer at Hamilton Re
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, January 12, 2026--Hamilton Insurance Group, Ltd. (NYSE: HG) ("Hamilton" or the "Company") announced today the appointment of Susan Steinhoff as Chief Underwriting Officer at Hamilton Re, the Companyâ€™s Bermuda-based insurance and reinsurance underwriting platform.

headline: Markel Insurance appoints Preeti Gureja as Chief Risk Officer, US and Bermuda
summary: Markel Insurance, the insurance operation within Markel Group Inc. (NYSE:MKL), today announced the appointment of Preeti Gureja as Chief Risk Officer, US & Bermuda, subject to any required regulatory approvals. In her role, Gureja will lead the risk agenda across Markel's US and Bermuda insurance operations and report to Henry Gardener, Chief Risk Officer, Markel Insurance.

headline: 3 Reasons Investors Watch Chubb (CB)
summary: Chubb trades at $306.81 and has moved in lockstep with the market. Its shares have returned 9.5% over the last six months while the S&P 500 has gained 10.4%.
